definition: used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The insect found itself entangled in an inextricable net.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫发现自己被缠在一个逃脱不掉的罗网中。

sentences.english: In the Entomology research, counting the individual numbers of Insects often frustrate the workers.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫学研究中常常会遇到对昆虫数量进行统计的工作。

sentences.english: In the Entomology research, counting the individual numbers of Insects often frustrate the workers.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫学研究中常常会遇到对昆虫数量进行统计的工作。

sentences.english: Norwegian Journal of Entomology, with Insekt-Nytt.
sentences.chinese: 挪威昆虫学杂志》附《昆虫新闻》。

sentences.english: Norwegian Journal of Entomology, with Insekt-Nytt.
sentences.chinese: 挪威昆虫学杂志》附《昆虫新闻》。
大多数的昆虫都有六只脚。

sentences.english: Its teeth were sharp and built for eating insects.
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿很尖利，是为咀嚼昆虫准备的。

sentences.english: This section about insects is written by a respectable specialist.
sentences.chinese: 关于昆虫的这一章是由一个德高望重的专家写的。

sentences.english: Then you eat them. The insects that is.
sentences.chinese: 然后你吃它们，它们是昆虫。

sentences.english: A facultative pathogen of some insect species commonly used as a biopesticide.
sentences.chinese: 一些昆虫的兼性病原物，常用作生物杀虫剂。

sentences.english: Frank consults his niece, Ann, about how to handle an insect invasion.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克向他的侄女安请教如何对付昆虫的侵害。

sentences.english: Any of various other flying insects, such as the caddis fly.
sentences.chinese: 例如石蛾等任何一种其他会飞的昆虫。

sentences.english: Instinctual knowledge also instructs the insect kingdoms in their wherewithal.
sentences.chinese: 本能知识也引导昆虫王国产生必要的行为。

sentences.english: Nocturnal insects such as moths wouldn't need such large goblets to be lured over.
sentences.chinese: 勾引飞蛾一类的食弥昆虫根本不需要如此大费周章。

sentences.english: The insects bite itched all night.
The examined specimens are deposited in the Institute of Entomology, Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究标本保存于沈阳师范大学昆虫研究所。

definition: to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
